title: Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes Were Spotted Trying on Halloween Masks Together and the Pictures are Hysterical
text:
From Seventeen

Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes have been much more public about their relationship, lately, even posting a video making fun of the way they kiss.

They seem to be getting shy again, however, as they wear masks, seemingly to shield themselves from paparazzi.

Camila Cabello and Shawn Mendes have been getting more and more public lately, as made evident by the intense make out video they posted on Instagram last week. While they haven't confirmed their relationship, their recent actions seemed almost like a confirmation in itself, or at least a sign that some sort of reveal was coming soon.

Now, though, Shamila seems to be getting shy again. Yesterday, the pair was spotted at a Halloween store in West Hollywood (side note: PLEASE say they were picking out a couples costume). When they left the store, Shawn and Camila threw on some masks, which resulted in a hilarious paparazzi moment.

View photos Photo credit: BACKGRID More

It's unclear if Shawn and Camila were hiding rom the paps (I mean, it's still pretty obvious that it's them), or if they were having some fun (which also wouldn't be surprising). Either way, I'm all for it, all I'm asking is that Shawn opt for a different mask next time, because that weird baby thing is going to haunt my dreams tonight.

Follow Carolyn on Instagram.
